reviewText: If you're open minded and seeking the truth about our ancient human origins, this is required. If you want to know who is responsible for human manipulation and enslavement, this is required. The Anunnaki genetically jump started homo sapiens to use as slaves, but before they left us, the Chitauri were waiting to take advantage of the departure. Through inserting their genetics into certain human bloodlines, the Chitauri created the means to enslave humanity!

Title: N/A

reviewText: `The 3 DVD set `The Reptilian Agenda' consists of an exhaustive interview session conducted by the well know conspiracy expert David Icke with Zulu shaman and "Keeper of the Ancient Knowledge", Credo Mutwa. As you might guess, three discs is a rather massive amount of time, 400 minutes to be exact, so it's extremely difficult to maintain focus and interest for such a long period of time. Frequent breaks are not only recommended but are an absolute necessity.From my perspective, the first disc was by far the most interesting of the three. Credo's explanation of Earth's earliest times was a fascinating and complex mixture of universally held religious beliefs, traditional African mythology and arcane alchemical speculations such as: a canopy of mist once encompassed the planet blocking the light of the sun and stars, mankind once communicated with all of creation via telepathy and the first humans were anatomically androgynous.These are but a few of the revelations that await the uninitiated viewer. For those already familiar with David Ickes' hypothesis this will serve as yet another confirmation of what you already believe. So if you're prepared for a paradigm shattering journey into alternative world history join David and Credo as they explore their mutually shared belief that the history we have been taught all our lives is not the truth but a clever manipulation by the ruling elite that control this planet. Learn about an ancient extraterrestrial/multi-dimensional race of reptilian race that has been manipulating mankind and world events since the beginning.Credo Mutwa is obviously an intelligent man and seems to be sincere about his beliefs and experiences, but that doesn't necessary make everything he says true. Do I believe it? Well..., let's just say I'm willing to postulate the unthinkable.
summary: "Kingship Of The Stars" ~ The Children Of The Python, The Eye That Kills And The Denial Of The Truth
Title: N/A

reviewText: I love the much maligned David Icke, and that is how I ended up purchasing this DVD. I learned over the years that whichever is much maligned by the mainstream media is the way to go. The negative elite, after all, controls the mainstream press. I am glad that David Icke has preserved what Credo Mutwa knows about life. He is getting up there in age. Having said all of that, I think the DVD is too pricey, and more often than not, I had to strain to understand what Credo Mutwa was saying. This is the reason for the four star rating.
summary: One of the last shaman's wisdom

reviewText: This an amazing collection put together by conspiracy theorist David Icke, who interviews Credo Mutwa, a Zulu Shaman who confirms with great detail that the forces that control this world are of reptilian origin!As bizare as it seems from our day to day conditioned version of reality, the political leaders of today like George Bush, Tony Blair etc. aren't infact human!  They are part of a genetic stream of bloodlines that have been controlling the planet for thousands of years.  From our perception, they look like humans, but they are actually reptilian shapeshifters who can transform into reptilian and back into human again.This theory is'nt new by any means, although it is massively coming to light now, people have been researching and uncovering the reptilian race for many years.  Credo Mutwa has been threatened with his life, and his family but still has the courage to speak out, this truly is an amazing man!People who disbelieve this information, are generally people who haven't done any kind of research.  The truth is reptilians do exist whether you believe it or not.  This isn't the only confirmation of the existence of a reptilian race, there is a mass of evidence out there, it's just a case of whether or not you look at, or rather not go there because of fear of what you might find.
summary: Everybody should listen to this dvd!

reviewText: This is a rather unique set of DVDs - at least it is very different than anything I have read so far.  It has elicited enough curiosity for me to check out some other related materials.  Credo Mutwa presents a cultural and historical view you are not likely to encounter in your regular history books.  What I have found most fascinating are the stories related to some of Credo Mutwa's personal experiences.  You can interpret them any way you like, but they are most certainly very, very interesting.  Perhaps you also find them intriguing enough to look for even more information.I did wish to share another angle on this "reptilian" thing from Western Alchemy.  If you look at alchemical emblems (pictures related to different processes of inner alchemical transformation), you will notice a lot of reptiles in those emblems.  They stand for unrefined energy, what you'd call the energy of "low human nature".  In some emblems, like "Ripley Scroll", at the beginning of a spiritual journey (and all of us are on such a journey), this "reptilian" energy has the upper hand.  Through the process of inner transformation - it is then transmuted and one's higher or spiritual nature and one's spiritual self has the upper hand.  The lower nature manifests as fear and acts motivated by fear, the higher nature manifests as love and acts motivated by love.  The higher nature having the higher "vibration" eventually consumes the lower vibration and fear becomes transmuted into love.From the perspective of quantum physics (and metaphysics) everything is made out of energy - everything that has form - from the ideas one forms in mind down to the physical things is made out of energy and vibrates at a particular frequency.  Our physical senses register only certain frequencies and we tend to call that which we can experience through physical senses as real and that which we cannot as unreal or imaginary.  Sometimes, some people do experience things that are not part of our normal daily experience and they may seem odd to us when we have no reference point to anything like it in our experience.  So, the material on these DVDs will seem to some people odd, to some people just made up - I have found it interesting, even though there were points on these DVDs about which I have different opinion than Credo Mutwa.
